---
title: Inferior Trunk of the Brachial Plexus
---

# Origin {#origin}
The inferior trunk originates from nerve roots [C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}) and [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}}).


# Function

- 4th-5th fingers of hand @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- Motor innervation to intrinsic hand muscles @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

# Dysfunction

The inferior trunk is the most COMMONLY compressed neural structure in TOS @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
